department: <Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)>
description: Tenders are invited from qualified suppliers for the purchase of Water Jet Cutting Table. The contractor must provide the number and configuration of equipment detailed in Annex A. AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2022-10-03 by 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
